items.content_html: (Note: This project is untested beyond basic functionality due to the 100USD API limitations on X). Self-sufficient tool for analyzing Twitter interactions using Node.js, vanilla JS, HTML, & CSS. Securely connects via OAuth 2.0, fetches & analyzes interactions. Lightweight, & easy to deploy.
items.title: SejinDoesArt/twittertruefriends: (Note: This project is untested beyond basic functionality due to the 100USD API limitations on X). Self-sufficient tool for analyzing Twitter interactions using Node.js, vanilla JS, HTML, & CSS. Securely connects via OAuth 2.0, fetches & analyzes interactions.  Lightweight, & easy to deploy.

items.content_html: tspace-echo-spear is a lightweight API framework for Node.js that is fast and highly focused on providing the best developer experience. It aims to be performant HTTP & Websocket Server using uWebSockets written in C++.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
